sentence: She added: "He doesn't have the votes that are there, because there's many of us that are very unhappy about the failure to hold Republicans accountable, while conservatives like me, Paul Gosar and many others just constantly take the abuse by the Democrats."
author: Chris Cillizza
title: One sentence that sums up Kevin McCarthy's House speaker problem

sentence: That could be bad news for MAGA Reps. Paul Gosar, Andy Biggs and Mo Brooks.
author: NewsHound Ellen
title: ‘Stop The Steal’s’ Ali Alexander Flips?

sentence: Far-right activist Ali Alexander went into hiding after the Jan. 6 attack on the U.S. Capitol, but he did publish a video in which he claimed he met with GOP lawmakers such as Reps. Paul Gosar (R-AZ) and Mo Brooks (R-AL) ahead of the riots.
author: Sarah K. Burris
title: NY Times reporter asks why the Jan. 6 committee won't subpoena Mo Brooks and Paul Gosar
